import React from 'react'; import './Certifications.css'; const Certifications = () => { return (

Certifications

  • Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) – Govt Higher Secondary School, Kalappambadi, 2020 – 71.33%

  • BE in Electrical and Electronics Engineering – MKCE, Karur – CGPA: 8.129 (up to 5th sem)

); }; export default Certifications;
